<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ghost](/Traits.aspx?ID=753)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 362 <sup>1.1</sup>

Lost souls that haunt the world as incorporeal undead are called ghosts.
name: Ghost
